title: Great app! With awesome developer support!
comment: Working perfect thank you!

Hi Christopher, version 4.1.4 fixes the authentication issue with qBittorrent version 3.2.1. Note: After the update, if you still have the authentication error you might need to close and start the app.

title: I wish I would've found this SOONER!
comment: This app (along with the server) gives the ability to completely control and tweak pretty much any aspect of your torrents remotely. LOVE IT
Hi OPeCKiE, I'm glad you like qBittorrent (server and Android app). The lack of a good remote for qB was my main motivation for developing the app. Thanks for your comments and rating.

title: Love it
comment: Material design update is great! Am I missing something or have you removed the ability to delete a torrent and it's files?

Hi Trevor, thanks for comments about the Material design update. Delete torrent and its data is still available. Just touch the X icon beside the trash bin icon in the torrent details view. Let me know if you can't see the X icon. Best regards!

title: Material
comment: So sexy now its material design
Thanks Alan for your comments and rating. I'm glad you like the Materia Design adaptation. Best regards!

title: Doesn't connect
comment: I've tried everything I can think of but can't connect remotely.
Hi John, the latest version fixes all connection issues. Best regards!

title: Authentication Error Troubles
comment: *Update* New version fixed the Authentication error.  It's still a bit of a bear to pair up...It took a few tries. Back to five stars.  Got a new phone and had to install fresh.  For the life of me can get the Authentication to work.  Can login through a browser but whether in the local network or outside....Network connection failed Authentication error.  Wish there was a forums.

Hi Eric, what version of qBittorrent are you using? Try increasing this values: Connection timeout: 10 secs, Data timeout: 16 secs...forum https://qbforums.shiki.hu/index.php/topic,2655.120.htmlttps://qbforums.shiki.hu/index.php/topic,2655.120.html. Best regards!

title: Not working with qBittorrent 3.2
comment: UPDATE 05/15/2015 Got feedback from the developer the day after my review, and an update was published the day after that. Working fine now and does exactly what ti's always done. Upgrading from 3 to 5 stars   I recently updated my computer to qBittorrent 3.2 and the Android app no longer works. Despite changing the app setting to recognize v3.2, uninstalling and reinstalling and trying 2 different android devices with 2 different computers, I couldn't connect to v3.2  of the desktop software.  Downgrading to 3.1.12 immediately resolved my issues. Would have given 5 stars before the last desktop update but leaving at 3 until this issue is resolved.

Hi Rock,  version 3.94 fixed the authentication issue with qBittorrent version 3.2.0. Note: You might need to restart your qBittorrent server (webui) because your device might be blocked due to the failed attempts.  Please keep me posted. Regards!

title: Fantastic
comment: This app is the main reason for me swapping from uTorrent, works flawlessly for me, once set up it hasn't missed a beat and let's me control my torrents at home from anywhere.
Hi Sam, thanks for your comments and rating. I'm glad you like qBittorrent and to know it works for yout flawlessly. Best regards!

title: Havent Been able to get it working
comment: Ive been working on getting this app connected to my Qbittorrent client for awhile now, have everything set up right and can connect in browers, just not through the app. if i could get this working, it would totally be a 5 start app

Hi Tammer, you can check how to set your connection here http://git.io/pQB5. One important setting to check is your qBittorrent server version http://git.io/jYlg, which you have to choose among 2.x, 3.1.x and 3.2.x options. Please keep me posted. Best regards! EDIT: Can you get connected?

title: Works well, frequently updated
comment: Is it possible to add an option to sort by date (date added/created on; and completion date)?
Hi Jeff, thanks for your rating. Order by creation date is possible, but sorting by completed date is not because the latter is not saved by qBittorrent. Best regards!

title: Works perfectly
comment: Works perfectly easy setup had it running in under 2 mins great work  No problems running under lollipop either
Azeez thanks for reporting it works on Lollipop, also thanks for your comments and rating. I hope it helps you to manage your torrents. Best regards!

title: Great app!
comment: This app is awesome! Great alternative to any other remote torrent app. The only complaint I have is that when a torrent is selected on the left column, and a refresh occurs, it deselects that torrent, refreshing the whole app. If a torrent is in focus showing the details in the right column and a refresh occurs, it should keep that torrent in focus and only refresh the right column.

Hi David, you are right. This happens on devices with big screens such as tablets, and it will change in future releases. In fact, it's on the roadmap of the project https://github.com/lgallard/qBittorrent-Client/issues/23. Thanks for your feedback and rating.  EDIT: You can also increase the refresh period, so you can check the info. Best regards!

When I click on a .torrent file that I've downloaded locally, and select this APP to open it with, I get 'host / server not found'. BUT clearly it is available because (1) I configured it correctly and (2) I already had another downloading (so it's clearly able to find the host server). Please fix. EDIT: Upgrading to 4 stars. It's not yet fixed, but the quick, courteous reply, including an updated version, means the DEVS care. =:). Sure, I will contact you offline with detail. PS I  use latest. Thank you!

Hi Noel, what version of qBittorrent server are you using? Server version 2.x rejects sending torrent files if they are too big. Does it happen with all .torrent files? Can you email me the .torrent file you having trouble with?

title: Stable and does what you need it to do
comment: Great app. Keep up the good work
Michael thanks for your comments and rating. I hope it helps you to manage your torrents. Best regards!

title: Wont work over 3g?
comment: Works fine on home network but will not connect over 3/4g even though I have correctly configured all required settings in the Windows UI. Am I doing something wrong? I need to be able to send a torrent file whilst out and about..

Hi Mike,

It works over 3G/4G, I send torrents all the time on the go...but you have to use your public IP address for accessing qBittorrent Web UI. Did you try reaching the Web UI over 3G/4G. Please keep me informed to help you. EDIT: Hi Mike, Could you get connected over 3G/4G? Best regards!

title: Need feature
comment: 1. Button to switch alternative and global download speed  2. checkbox for download sequential order for movies (if you right click the torrent on qbittorrent pc there's a option there) 3. Please add guide (how to use :) guys if you dont know what's your IP try this 1. Go to desktop 2. hit winkey+r type "cmd" hit enter 3. then type "ipconfig" I Pv4 address # is your ip write it down on this app setting.

Hi Melvin, thanks for your rating and comments.  EDIT: Sequential downloads is available in latest releases, but your qB server version must be > 3.2.x. About the alternative download, this is set according to what you schedule (you can't switch it). Guide of how to use it is available on github wiki pages http://git.io/pQB5. Best regards!

title: Awesome app but ...
comment: Need some more options that web up don't have. 1st is the ability to set individual download location and 2nd is to show total download upload speed.

payam thanks for your comments and rating. About your requests: 1) If individual download location is available in the web UI API then it can be added to the App. 2) Total upload/download will be in future releases. Best regards!

title: Everything works as advertised
comment: Option to sort torrents added, as well as the fifth star.
Hi Ivan, sorting by Name, Priority, ETA, Progress, Ratio, Upload and Download speed is available in the latest release. EDIT: Thanks for your comments and ratings. Best regards!

title: Amazing app
comment: Work like a charm
Hi Dejan thanks for your comments and rating. I hope it helps you to manage your torrents. Best regards!

title: Not working for me
comment: Never been able to get it working. Looked all over the internet for a fix but nothing.

Jon, enable the Web UI as explained here http://bit.ly/14DWOkK. The latest release now shows you why you can't get connected. Please, check: IP/hostname, https, port, username and password, qBittorrent 2.x option. Also try to reach the Web UI using your phone's browser. EDIT: Jon, could you connect to your qBittorrent server?
Thanks for the pro app :)
Nalin thanks for your comments and rating.  I hope it help you to manage your torrents!
